# Crypto.com API Documentation

> 72 documentation files | ~73k tokens

## General Documentation

- [Authentication](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/authentication.md): Before sending any requests, you'll need to generate a new API key.
- [Change Log](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/change_log.md): - On 2025-02-27 8:00 UTC,
- [Error Codes](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/error_codes.md): These codes are shared by both the response, and the reason field for rejected
- [Network Connectivity](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/network_connectivity.md): Note: REST API requests need to be sent as "Content Type: application/json"
- [Rate Limits](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/rate_limits.md): For authenticated calls, rate limits are per API method, per API key:
- [Response Formats](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/response_formats.md): | Name     | Type   | Description                                              |

## Public Endpoints

- [POST Post Public Auth](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/endpoints/public/post_public_auth.md)
- [POST Post Public Get Announcements](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/endpoints/public/post_public_get_announcements.md)
- [POST Post Public Get Book](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/endpoints/public/post_public_get_book.md)
- [POST Post Public Get Candlestick](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/endpoints/public/post_public_get_candlestick.md)
- [POST Post Public Get Expired Settlement Price](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/endpoints/public/post_public_get_expired_settlement_price.md)
- [POST Post Public Get Instruments](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/endpoints/public/post_public_get_instruments.md)
- [POST Post Public Get Insurance](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/endpoints/public/post_public_get_insurance.md)
- [POST Post Public Get Risk Parameters](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/endpoints/public/post_public_get_risk_parameters.md)
- [POST Post Public Get Tickers](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/endpoints/public/post_public_get_tickers.md)
- [POST Post Public Get Trades](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/endpoints/public/post_public_get_trades.md)
- [POST Post Public Get Valuations](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/endpoints/public/post_public_get_valuations.md)
- [POST Post Public Staking Get Conversion Rate](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/cryptocom/endpoints/public/post_public_staking_get_conversion_rate.md)
